entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:51 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 14.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 late this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 6.
